title: Cataclysm
description: Her world upended in a disastrous cataclysm, Crystal faces her new world beside her husband. First, though, she has to deal with the dark secret heâ€™s been his other identity, Mars, the God of War. Along the way she also has to deal with threats to her life from his ex-wife, the Goddess of Love, who wants her Mars back. Join Crystal as she fends off Venus while coming to grips with the reality of her own husband's immortality.
author: Stephen H. King
